definitions.body: :Mal 3:1 lord (Ph. [[אדן]])—´[[א]] Ps 12:5 + cstr. [[אֲדוֹן]] Jos 3:11 +; pl. [[אֲדׂנִים]] Is 26:13 +; cstr. [[אֲדׂנֵי]] De 10:17 +; sf. [[אֲדׂנֵינוּ]] 1Sa 25:14 + etc.; ([[אֲדׂנִי]], [[אֲדׂנַי]], [[אֲדׂנׇי]] are variations of Mass. pointing to distinguish divine reference fr. human. Pl., with few exc. an intens. pl. of rank; word takes sf. as pl. in all other pers.; so doubtless here. Orig. reading prob. in all cases [[אֲדׂנַי]] (v. Dalman:Der Gottesname Adonaj; Lag:BN 188 makes [[אֲדׂנׇי]] an Aram. format.); [[אֲדׂנִי]] now found in J 51 t.; in E † Ge 31:35, Ge 32:19, Ge 42:10, Ex 21:5; in P † Ge 23:6, Ge 23:11, Ge 23:15, Nu 36:2, Nu 36:2; often S & K; in Chr only in sources, 1Ch 21:3, 1Ch 21:3, 1Ch 21:3, 1Ch 21:23 (= 2Sa 24:3; 2Sa 24:22) 2Ch 2:13, 2Ch 2:14, Is & Je only in hist. parts Is 36:8, Is 36:9, Is 36:12, Je 37:20, Je 38:9; elsewh. † Da 1:10, Da 10:16, Da 10:17, Da 10:19, Da 12:8, Zec 1:9, Zec 4:4, Zec 4:5, Zec 4:13, Zec 6:4, Ps 110:1, Ju Jdg 4:18, Jdg 6:13, Ru 2:13; [[בִּי אֲדנׇי]] † Ex 4:10, Ex 4:13, Jos 7:8 (J) Ju Jdg 6:15, Jdg 13:8 is referred to God, but [[בִּי אֲדנִי]] † Ge 43:20, Ge 44:18, Nu 12:11 (J) 1Sa 1:26, 1Sa 25:24, 1Ki 3:17, 1Ki 3:26 ref. to human superiors. There is uncertainty as to [[אֲדׂנׇ֠י]] Ge 18:3, Ge 19:18; [[אֲדׂ֠נַי]] Ge 19:2)—†

sg. lord, master (1) ref. to men: (a) supt. of household, or of affairs Ge 45:8, Ge 45:9 (E) = Ps 105:21; (b) master Ps 12:5; (c) king Je 22:18, Je 34:5; (2) ref. to God, [[הָאָדוֹן יהוה]] the Lord Yahweh (v. [[יהוה]]) Ex 23:17, Ex 34:23 (Cov't codes); [[אֲרוֹן כָּל־הָאָרֶץ]] Lord of the whole earth Jos 3:11, Jos 3:13 (J) Ps 97:5, Zec 4:14, Zec 6:5, Mic 4:13; [[חֻבָאוֹת]] ´[[י]] ´[[הָא]], earlier Is 1:24, Is 3:1, Is 10:33, Is 19:4 ([[אֲדׂנׇי]] Is 10:16 in common MT; not Massora, doubtless scrib. error); ´[[הָא]] Mal 3:1; [[אָדוֹן]] Ps 114:7.

definitions.title: n.pr.
definitions.body: of God, parallel with Yahweh, substit. for it oft. by scrib. error, & eventually supplanting it. In earlier Is 3:17 + (19 t. seeming to belong here), Am 7:7, Am 7:8, Am 9:1, Ez Eze 18:25, Eze 18:29, Eze 33:17, Eze 33:20, Eze 21:14 (prob. ´[[אֲדׂנׇי י]] as in usual phrase); Zec 9:4, Mal 1:12, Mal 1:14, La 1:14 + (14 t.) Ps 2:4, Ps 37:13, Ps 78:65, Ps 90:17 (? [[יהוה]]) Ps 110:5 (Dalman puts most of these sub (a);—many cases are doubtful); 1Ki 3:10, 1Ki 3:15 (Mass. [[אדני]] for [[יהוה]] cf. Dalm. 2Ki 7:6; Dalm. rightly questions; he rds. [[יהוה]]). The phrases [[אֲדׂנׇי אֱלֽהַי]] Ps 38:16, Ps 86:12, Adonay my God; [[אֲדׂנׇי הָאֱלֽהִים]] Da 9:3, [[אֱלֽהֵינוּ]] ´[[א]] Da 9:9, Da 9:15, [[הָאֵל]] ´[[א]] Da 9:4 favour taking ´[[א]] Da 1:2, Da 9:7, Da 9:8 ([[יהוה]] ?) v:Da 9:16, v:Da 9:17, v:Da 9:19, v:Da 9:19, v:Da 9:19 as the divine name.
